summary:
"Back to the Future" is a popular 1985 science fiction movie about time travel. Teenager Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) accidentally travels back to 1955 in a special car built by his friend, scientist Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd). In the past, Marty stops his parents from falling in love, which could erase his own existence. He must fix this and get back to the future.

The movie was made after many tries by directors Robert Zemeckis and Bob Gale. It became a huge hit, making lots of money and winning awards. People love it so much that it's now considered one of the best science fiction movies ever. It even led to two sequels and a big franchise with games, rides, and more.
title: Back to the Future
